review: Very easy to setup and use. Though, I wished Google would get on the ball and fix some of the bugs. Casting from PC to this just isn't worth it. The video quality is horrible. Also, I don't like that the only way to cast to the Chormecast is via WiFi. I can't cast from a PC that's on CAT5. If casting from an Android devise, it works perfectly. I took one star because of the bug, and WiFi limitation isn't that big of a deal to me. Maybe all of this will be fixed through a patch or something.
